name: Great Developers
overview:
GreatDevelopers is the start up working extensively on SaaS.

They are actively involved in custom Software development and offer a number of services like : Financial Front, Middle and Back Office systems Windows Softwares/Applications Website Development Webservices

They are working on a number of SaaS applications like http://www.HRStop.com (Human Resource Management System) and http://www.Beejak.com( Invoice Management System)

Their latest product HR Stop offers a number of services to its users like 1.) Employee Self Services 2.) Employees payroll system 3.) Recruitment system 4.) Leave management 5.) Employees tracking system 6.) Information and news management system
